document.discussion_title: Sport24.co.za | Le Clos into 100m butterfly final
document.topic_text: Phelps Stares Down Rival Before 200m Butterfly Semi-Final 00:48 Olympic swimming rivals, Michael Phelps and Chad Le Clos, gave a tense display of competition before their 200m butterfly semi-final on Monday night. In the pre-game ready room, Le Clos started shadowboxing in front of Phelps – and the 19-time Olympic gold medalist was not impressed. Under his... You Might Like
